CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 10;Pecuniary damage - financial award;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses award - domestic proceedings;Costs and expenses award - Convention proceedings
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant , the ORG “ ORG ” ( ORG “ PERSON ” ) , is a privately owned legal entity , registered and situated in GPE , GPE . It owns a DATE newspaper DATE ( газета “ NORP ” ) .
CARDINAL . The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
CARDINAL . On DATE The Day published an article by PERSON PERSON entitled “ Is this a second PERSON for poor PERSON , or a NORP version of GPE ? ” The article read as follows :

“ Epigraph : All of this is about her , our PERSON as well as yours . About the position that a progressive socialist , PERSON , may or may not hold - depending on which of the scenarios from NORP [ the name of the street where ORG is situated ] will eventually win the “ tender ” offered by office No . CARDINAL . Certainly , allowing for a certain margin of error , it will be possible to forecast which of the nominees would be easier to manipulate from the said office .

The first version [ concerning her position ] was predicted by DATE as far back as the spring , and was based on the assumption that , from the point of view of NORP , PERSON [ leader of ORG ] was not “ nice or bright ” enough for the role of “ a scarecrow ” in the pre - election scenario à la russe : “ the reformer against the red threat ” . PERSON , with her “ Uranium mines ” , and PERSON are much more impressive and the best political scientists and sociologists told us , therefore , that she was the only person able to defeat PERSON in the second round of the elections with a predicted PERCENT of the poll . Political scientists and sociologists were soon proved wrong and PERSON rating substantially decreased . However , this is due perhaps to the freedom of scientific debate and discord around the main body [ that of the President ] rather than PERSON real ratings . Of course , it is hard to believe that CARDINAL of the country 's population , watching a TV programme where PERSON battered a deputy who had been knocked to the floor with the help of PERSON 's fists , would choose not to call an ambulance and medical help , but instead would race to vote for “ progressive socialism ” . It is evident , however , that the “ Zhirinovsky percentage ” of PERCENT is a normal result in a normal country , but not one where the society is mainly composed of sick people and beggars ... PERSON special role was confirmed by the “ painful ” recounting of the number of signatures in support of her [ registration as a candidate ] at ORG ( ORG ) . DATE the highly respected President of the ORG , Mr PERSON , told us how wrong ORG was when it ignored the required CARDINAL signatures and compelled the ORG to register the nominated candidates for the position of President in neglect of this norm . But only recently the same NORP shared his insights with the public which , if translated from the confidential - emotional language used , could sound like this : all the candidates registered by the ORG ( acting on its own ! ) should not have been registered , because if the signatures submitted by the nominees had been subjected to serious scrutiny , none of the candidates , including PERSON , would have withstood verification . What then was the criterion ? Was it a presumption on the part of the ORG and its President about which scenario would be the best at the pre - election stage ? For the ORG as well , apparently , it is not a secret which discussions preceded the decision of NORP to register PERSON , who had problems for various reasons . Perhaps PERSON , who left our country prematurely and in a very untimely manner , might be able to disclose the details ? Or maybe PERSON 's election agent , PERSON PERSON , who fought for and won PERSON 's registration ?

As was discovered , it was not the apprehension , in the event of her failure to register , of having PERSON as a wild force that could break loose which influenced the final decision of NORP , but the scenario “ PERSON v. PERSON ” , which is urgently being modified because of ORG [ PERSON 's ] alleged unreliability . The issue concerns the certainty repeatedly demonstrated by the Speaker [ of ORG ] PERSON , that they [ Bankova ] would manage to agree with PERSON , and the steady position of ORG ( CPU ) ideologists who believe that the CPU does not want a clear loss , or a clean victory ( referring to GPE ) . This provoked even more commotion in NORP . The NORP scenario that was used in the past is rusting away , and there is nothing else ! Therefore an improved scenario was introduced : taking PERSON to the second round , nominating her against PERSON - with the certainty that the fear of having PERSON and PERSON managing the country would line everyone up to vote for PERSON , including the left - wing .

The boys at NORP are desperate gamblers because their venture might be answered adequately . For instance , the headquarters of all the main candidates who have already dropped out of the competition might negotiate and decide to let their supporters vote freely . Of course , they would not ask them to support PERSON , but to work in such a way that the motto “ Anyone but PERSON ! ” would be as topical as ever . Ultimately , it is no less immoral than the scenarios of PERSON 's headquarters . And if our “ green ” democracy has to have “ the mumps ” , the earlier the better : the acquired immunity would be stronger , as children 's diseases have to be contracted in childhood .

In a country under President PERSON it would be both frightful and enjoyable , but not for long . Like in the GPE under PERSON . And what country - wide insanity that was / ... / At the beginning it was bizarre and then funny . He would come out , yell in front of the people , so self - assured , artistic , his voice so confident , metallic , everything clear , elderly ladies screaming and sobbing , trying to kiss his hands ... And not a single institution obeying him . He seized an automatic gun and rushed to replace the head of the police . [ He ] replaced him . But nobody cared about the new one . Then he rushed to the ORG [ Security Service of GPE ] . And here they spoke to him politely , and they threw the people he had just appointed down the stairs and promised they would have something torn out ... ORG flies and the differently coloured opposition is becoming united , the gangsters who left are returning , public servants from housing maintenance offices up to Government officials are sabotaging [ him ] , PERSON [ ORG ] is imposing restrictions on presidential powers - all of them are gathering against ORG , life is not getting any better , his personal charisma is falling to pieces , people are sobering up . Some people say : this was the LOC , it was backed by GPE . But we are not going to dwell upon the matter of who backed it and when they appeared . However , the point is that ORG is not the ORG . Had there been an army , everything would have been over sooner , citizens ... PERSON of course will seek to order General PERSON about and make him resign . This would be something worth seeing ... And PERSON will become such a friendly body , and constitutional amendments will be adopted without delays ! The heyday of parliamentarism ! Are pre - term presidential elections likely to be held in spring ? PERSON , may God give her health , will finally put an end to disputes about whether the NORP soil can bear its own “ Newtons ” in skirts . And the only prospective evil as a result of this experiment might be the complexities that will confront PERSON as a female candidate during the next elections ... Some people say : and what about the country and the people ! ? Ladies and gentlemen , do not prevent people from exercising their own sacred right to vote , if you are NORP . And do not prevent the same people from facing the consequences of their choice and their responsibility for it ...

However , we are unlikely to see the full extent of the people 's joy or our PERSON 's triumph , as long as there remain a few “ real raving madmen ” in NORP . As a result , apparently , the blueprint of the NORP headquarters will be developed directly along the lines of the “ NORP scenario ” . And here we will discover great news about who can claim the role of GPE in our country , who had been appointed to ORG prior to the elections and later surrendered to the incumbent President [ PERSON ] , and thus largely determining the latter 's victory during the new elections . According to an information source , the scenario of “ the homegrown GPE ” emerging before the first round of the elections is as follows . At DATE it is planned to launch a mass media campaign supporting the idea of setting up ORG ( Alas ! But PERSON seems to have already mentioned the need to revive this structure ) . In DATE , at the numerous requests of the workers , the President will issue a decree setting up this committee . It will start functioning immediately . CARDINAL of the events that will be widely covered by the media is to be held in conjunction with the ORG and is to prevent violations of electoral law . At the same time , the media will launch an anti - PERSON campaign ( only the pro - presidential media will move with this idea and they will be fully involved in it ) . And then the President , in accordance with the plan , should make a speech sternly demanding that the dirty propaganda campaign against the people 's defender be terminated . The people will applaud the President and then , at DATE , he will appoint the grateful PERSON as the Head of ORG . This would be followed by an official statement of candidates - PERSON and PERSON - as a result of which CARDINAL candidate will remain . PERSON will be dancing NORP . It means that she is still unlikely to hear the “ swan song ” of her political career , but the NORP script writers are rubbing their hands with glee , waiting for the electoral campaign to be over with a feeling that their strategic duty has been completely fulfilled . One should admit that the scenario is not weak . The matter to be addressed is the extent to which PERSON is ready for the originality of those who are using her , and to what extent she is aware of the level of cynicism of the system that has been preparing the background for DATE to allow this progressive socialist to demonstrate her brilliant abilities in accounting and auditing on behalf of the people ? The chain is getting tighter and the leash is getting shorter ... However , the PERSON - guided PERSON was quickly dismissed from his post and he eventually landed , with his [ PERSON 's ] help , in rich territory . The headquarters ' script writers , commissioned by the NORP oligarch , are unlikely to have the same long - term and prospective intentions for our PERSON . However , it is quite possible that , even perceiving the danger of this for herself , PERSON will be compelled to understand that she has been made an offer she can not refuse . It is hardly a coincidence that the GPE governor , PERSON , is telling the media that he financially supported the LOC 's [ ORG of GPE ] ORG . Then PERSON will also recollect how he promoted PERSON in GPE . And here Mr Rabinovych , who started work on PERSON ratings ( “ Rabinovych v. Moroz ” ... despite the feelings that Rabinovych may arouse in the majority of the population ) , following the advice from ORG , will recollect the LOC 's prospects ... And then it will be corroborated that PERSON had been helping PERSON not only because their family and that of Mr Razumkov were on friendly terms . It is possible that no one will have any more doubts that the cool opposition member is just “ a loudspeaker ” of the administration of the President of GPE , whose role is that of ORG ( as some slanderers would say ) and is employed and paid personally . The role is simple : you might say whatever you like , but act “ correctly ” , without making the Father [ the President ] grieve , whilst undermining his enemies .

So , if the theme of the “ People 's audit ” is outlined , the NORP plan will be launched . And PERSON 's competitor will be PERSON . The electoral palette will increasingly gain more clear - cut contours . PERSON and PERSON [ MPs ] have initiated another electoral block , an alliance that constitutes an alternative to that of the “ CARDINAL whales ” : Marchuk - Moroz - Tkachenko – the reasons are quite understandable . However , PERSON 's “ Rukh ” [ ORG ] appears and disappears now and then . But definitely there are still NORP [ MP ] and other loyal followers of the tactics of PERSON [ leader of another fraction of the “ GPE at the time ] , even though they were knocked down [ by PERSON 's “ Rukh ” ] . Fidgeting behind the ORG authorities on an ideological underlay with anti - left colouring . It will be determined here , DATE , which CARDINAL of the “ Rukhs ” is better prepared for defending the national - patriotic masses . Poor PERSON who is used to various kinds of “ kydalovo ” ( deception ) could not possibly answer the question : “ If they promise you the TIME 's office , will you go against PERSON ? ” After the centre - right had been joined by the “ green ” GPE [ a member of ORG ] whose main idea was to avoid PERSON 's anger while not working for him , there were no more doubts that the ideology of the block lies in self - preservation . And PERSON , an “ unidentified object ” who joined them , has crafty ideas himself . The general perception has not therefore changed .

Thus , only the “ triple alliance ” of Marchuk - Moroz - Tkachenko joined by “ an active bayonet , ” PERSON , still remains within NORP 's firing line , and on this alliance depends how successful all the candidates will be in NORP 's game aimed at ORG 's victory . ... Sometimes it really seems that our country deserves PERSON , or PERSON ... Are we poor PERSON indeed ? And had there not been the fear that the election results might be declared null and void - such fears being unanimously expressed by the pro - presidential people - it might have been possible to think that they were all right ... ”

CARDINAL . On DATE PERSON ( leader of the LOC ) lodged a complaint with ORG of GPE against DATE , seeking compensation for pecuniary and non - pecuniary damage because the information contained in the article published on CARDINAL DATE was untrue and damaged her dignity and reputation as a Member of ORG . On DATE the ORG of GPE allowed her claims in part and ordered DATE to pay Ms Vitrenko UAH CARDINAL in compensation for non - pecuniary damage . It also found that the whole article published in DATE was untruthful , since the applicant had failed to prove the truth of the information which it had published . It further ordered the newspaper to publish rectification of this information , within DATE , in one of the forthcoming issues of DATE , alongside the operative part of the judgment of DATE . In particular , the court held :

“ ... the court disagrees with the arguments raised by the defendants , since the information disseminated by them in DATE of CARDINAL DATE was untrue . This article was published on page CARDINAL in the column entitled “ Details ” and “ Prognosis ” . However it was not specified to the reader of the newspaper how he or she could distinguish “ the prognosis for the future ” from the facts and , moreover , the “ details ” ...

... the above - mentioned section DATE of ORG has a specific list of circumstances which exempt the editorial board from liability . This list does not include a “ prognosis with the details ” , and therefore the liability of the defendants is engaged regardless of “ whether they intended to evaluate the developments in the course of the previous presidential elections in GPE ...

... the expressions “ a second PERSON for poor PERSON or a NORP version of GPE ” , “ our and your PERSON , “ a scarecrow ( strashylka ) ” , “ a loudspeaker of ORG , acting as PERSON in GPE ” , as used by the author , may be [ regarded as ] ... the author 's imagination and are not “ generally accepted political rhetoric ” . They are , moreover , the author 's own “ value judgments ” ...

... Also , the court disagrees ... that this article pertains to PERSON as a candidate for the Presidency of GPE , but not to [ her ] private life ... The article pertains not to PERSON herself but deals with the existence of certain plans of the “ NORP ” [ the administration of the President of GPE ] and how PERSON could be manipulated by it ... The court considers that the personal life of the plaintiff as a person , a human being , is closely connected with her political views and beliefs and with her role in the political structure of society . Therefore the role of a “ scarecrow ” which , according to the prognosis of the defendant , PERSON PERSON , was planned by ORG of GPE , is untruthful . The court considers this to be the product of the author 's imagination ...

The court considers that such “ value judgments ” defame the honour and dignity of the plaintiff and her reputation , whereas she is the leader of the LOC , ... a member of PERSON , and a candidate for the position of President ... This means that the article concerns her both as a public and a private person . ... ”

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld this decision . In particular , it stated that the findings of the ORG of GPE were correct since the appellants had failed to prove , and the court did not establish , that the disseminated information was true .

CARDINAL . On DATE The Day published an article by Ms Tetiana PERSON entitled “ On FAC and the Little Sparrow : Leader of the CPU as ORG 's Last Hope ” . The relevant extracts of the article read as follows :

“ ... ORG was allegedly visited by a person resembling PERSON , PERSON 's election agent , who allegedly told the CPU leader : “ If you withdraw from the race [ presidential elections ] , you will lose your head . You withdraw your name from the list [ of candidates ] DATE - you will be buried DATE ...

... they are ready to go to the very “ end ” , following the resolutions of the ORG [ of ORG ] and after PERSON 's election , to collaborate with him and have the Government delivered to them as a present for their services ...

... ORG might be offended by DATE again . In vain . Here a parable has just dawned on me . In bitter weather a little sparrow was frozen while flying and collapsed . A cow was passing by and a cowpat fell directly onto the little sparrow . He warmed up , put his little head out and started chirping , in a gleeful mood . And at this point a cat enters , sneaks up on him and there is no more little sparrow . The moral : if you get into dung , just sit there and do not chirp . And remember , not everyone who excretes on you is your enemy and not everyone who pulls you out of the dung is your friend . I apologise for being so straightforward . ”

CARDINAL . NORP In DATE Mr PERSON ( the leader of ORG ) lodged a complaint with the Minsky ORG of GPE against DATE and PERSON PERSON , alleging that the information contained in the publication was untrue . He also sought to defend his honour , dignity and reputation and to obtain compensation for non - pecuniary damage . On DATE the ORG of GPE partly allowed Mr PERSON 's complaints and ordered DATE to pay him UAH CARDINAL,CARDINAL in compensation for non - pecuniary damage . It also ordered the newspaper to publish a rectification of the information found to be untrue alongside the operative part of the judgment of DATE . In particular , it held that :

“ ... in examining this case , account has to be taken of the fact that PERSON Petro M. PERSON is a political leader and the article relates to the area of his activity as a politician , and not that of an average citizen . ...

As to the other extracts from the article referred to by the plaintiff in his claim , the court considers that they were found to be untrue during the court hearing , since the defendant could not provide the court with evidence proving the truth of the information contained in the publication . ...

The defendant 's representative maintained during the hearing that these extracts were merely presumptions of the author of the article . However , he failed to confirm this . The court is sceptical , since from the text of the article it can not be understood that the journalist refers to her statements as presumptions and that the reader has to identify the text as a presumption . The comparison of the plaintiff to “ a little sparrow ” is in his [ the plaintiff 's ] opinion humiliating . Moreover , there was no evidence of an existing agreement before the elections between PERSON Petro PERSON and the officials in office as implied by the headline of the article “ The Leader of the CPU as PERSON 's Last Hope ” .

... this [ non - pecuniary ] damage resulted from the fact that the article was published before the presidential elections , in which the plaintiff was also a candidate . Therefore ... he was compelled to explain to the electorate the issues raised in the article . ... The applicant considers that this article accused him of betraying his party members , colleagues and the electorate . Damage was inflicted on him as a man of honour , taking into account the metaphors that the author used in her article . Thus , ORG published information that it had not verified and disseminated data that was untrue ... and PERSON invented information that was not true and disseminated it .... ”
CARDINAL . The court also concluded that the following should be adjudged untrue :
“ ... the headline of the article on the first page “ On FAC and the Little Sparrow : The leader of the CPU as ORG 's last hope . ”

... that ORG was allegedly visited by a person resembling PERSON , PERSON 's election agent , who allegedly told the CPU leader : “ If you withdraw from the race [ presidential elections ] , you will lose your head . You withdraw your name from the list [ of candidates ] DATE - you will be buried DATE ” ...

... they are ready to go to the very “ end ” , following the resolutions of the ORG [ of ORG ] and after PERSON 's election , to collaborate with him and have the Government delivered to them as a present for their services . ... ”

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld this decision . In particular , it stated that the Minsky ORG of GPE came to the correct conclusion that the respondent in this case had not proved the truth of the information disseminated about PERSON PERSON . It also held that the conclusions of the court were based on the case file and complied with the legislation in force .

“ ...
